Translations.Text: Mi pahile ki eka stri tyancyavara rajya karita ahe, jila sarva prakaracya vastumpaiki kahi na kahi pradana kele gele ahe ani tice sinhasana dekhila mothe bhavya ahe

Mi tila ani ticya janasamuhacya lokanna allaha'aivaji suryala sajada karatana pahile. Saitanane tyaci karme tyanna bhale cangale asalyace dakhavuna satya margapasuna tyanna rokhale ahe, yastava tyanna sanmarga prapta hota nahi
Ki kevala tyaca allahala sajada karava, jo akasancya ani dharaticya lapalelya vastunna bahera kadhato, ani je kahi tumhi lapavuna thevata ani jahira karata to te sarva kahi janato
(Arthata) allaha! Tyacyakherija konihi upasaniya nahi. Toca mahana arsa (isa-sinhasanam) ca svami ahe
(Sulemana) mhanale, ata amhi pahato ki tu khare bolalasa ki tu khota ahe
Majhe he patra ne'una tyanna de, maga tyancyapasuna dura ho'una paha ki te kaya uttara detata
Ti mhanali, he saradaranno! Majhyajavala eka mahattvapurna patra takale gele ahe
Je sulemanatarphe ahe ani jyaca arambha atisaya dayavana, mothya meharabana allahacya navane ahe
He ki tumhi majhyasamora vidroha karu naka ani muslima ho'una majhyajavala ya
Ti (rani) mhanali, he majhya darabari lokanno! Tumhi majhya ya samasyebabata mala salla dya. Mi konatyahi gostica antima phaisala, joparyanta tumaci upisthati ani mata nasela, karata nasate
Tya sarvanni uttara dile, amhi mothe majabuta ani saktisali ani khupa ladhavayye ahota. Ata yapudhe tumaca adhikara ahe. Tumhi svatahca vicara kara ki tumhi amhala konata adesa deta

Ti (rani) mhanali, badasaha (raje-maharaje) jevha ekhadya vastita pravesa karatata, tevha tila osada karuna takatata ani tithalya pratisthita lokanna apamanita karatata tevha loka dekhila aseca karatila
Ani mi tyanna eka najarana pathavinara ahe, maga pahate ki duta kaya uttara ghe'una parata yetata
